code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware}from"redux";import{composeWithDevTools}from"redux-devtools-extension";import{persistStore}from"redux-persist";import logger from"redux-logger";import rootReducer from"./root-reducer";var middlewares=[logger];export var store=createStore(rootReducer,composeWithDevTools(applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middlewares)));export var persistor=persistStore(store);
